SV018.SV018_Area500_Talk_Intro_00:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal16"/][UE:Meta key="235ff05db3d84136851acb75ae895a94" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/]My name's [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Normal16"/]Keesh[Npc:EmphasisEnd/].[etc:Wait frame="15"/] I came to the planet on
a field trip with my high school's Planetary
Science Club and wound up stranded.
SV018.SV018_Area500_Talk_Scenario_Hint_01_00:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal16"/][UE:Meta key="bf1e679362954aae9f8c673761358881" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yes"/]I'm grateful to you for rescuing me.[etc:Wait frame="15"/]
Thank you.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="bf1e679362954aae9f8c673761358881" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="SadFaceOnly"/]I was so happy to see Ms. [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Normal12"/]Mika[Npc:EmphasisEnd/] and [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Normal14"/]Sheeba[Npc:EmphasisEnd/]
from the Planetary Science Club are OK.[etc:Wait frame="15"/]
I guess [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Normal19"/]Kaia[Npc:EmphasisEnd/] hasn't been found yet.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="bf1e679362954aae9f8c673761358881" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/]Please keep searching for her.
SV018.SV018_Area500_Talk_Scenario_Hint_01_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal16"/][UE:Meta key="a1605c835c6c40cf8c52752ad7126be2" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Think"/]When you're separated from your traveling
companions,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] rescuers will have an easier
time finding you if you stay in one place.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="a1605c835c6c40cf8c52752ad7126be2" Scale="1"/]I'm glad I knew that cardinal rule for
survival,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] though I had hoped I'd never
have a chance to actually use it.
SV018.SV018_Area500_Talk_Scenario_Hint_01_02:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal16"/][UE:Meta key="76426895f2054ed1b2b497279f12ee5f" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/]The Planetary Science Club is very open to
different branches of study.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Normal14"/]Sheeba[Npc:EmphasisEnd/]'s into
astronomy, and [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Normal19"/]Kaia[Npc:EmphasisEnd/] loves meteorology.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="76426895f2054ed1b2b497279f12ee5f" Scale="1"/]My thing is digging in the dirt and studying
rocks.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] I want to get into more geological
surveying that lets me feel the land.
SV018.SV018_Area500_Talk_Scenario_Hint_01_03:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal16"/][UE:Meta key="8372d933e0254dd6a9a63b595dddfccf" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Sad"/]Ms. [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Normal12"/]Mika[Npc:EmphasisEnd/] hasn't been sleeping well.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] She
feels responsible for her students.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="8372d933e0254dd6a9a63b595dddfccf" Scale="1"/]But she was recently rescued too,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] and
she needs to take care of herself.[etc:Wait frame="15"/]
I'm worried about her.
SV018.SV018_Area500_Talk_Scenario_Hint_02_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal16"/][UE:Meta key="a0b52f3b377e43c18098f57cdb03b178" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yes"/]I'm happy [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Normal19"/]Kaia[Npc:EmphasisEnd/]'s safe.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] It's such a relief to
have her back.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="a0b52f3b377e43c18098f57cdb03b178" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="SadFaceOnly2"/]Both [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Normal14"/]Sheeba[Npc:EmphasisEnd/] and Ms. [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Normal12"/]Mika[Npc:EmphasisEnd/] have a strong
sense of responsibility.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] I was afraid they
would blame themselves for all of this.
SV018.SV018_Area500_Talk_Hint_01_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal16"/][UE:Meta key="fb51b112e67c440092d3e42c478c5172" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Think"/]Others think my actions are well-thought-
out,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] but I think I'm just slow to act.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="fb51b112e67c440092d3e42c478c5172" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="TalkFaceOnly"/]I'm not like [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Normal14"/]Sheeba[Npc:EmphasisEnd/],[etc:Wait frame="8"/] who has the leadership
skills to proactively jump into action.
SV018.SV018_Area500_Talk_Hint_01_02:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal16"/][UE:Meta key="d35e5179474a400da2a513f883a80cb3" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yes"/]I feel as though I'm honing my mind when I
get lost in the process of digging up rocks.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="d35e5179474a400da2a513f883a80cb3" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02FaceOnly"/]It's as if nature and I are becoming one.[etc:Wait frame="15"/]
I find it very soothing.
SV018.SV018_Area500_Talk_Hint_01_03:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal16"/][UE:Meta key="84941f4a8c984fcb88a91935cd7611e6" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yes"/][Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Normal19"/]Kaia[Npc:EmphasisEnd/]'s comments often make me aware of
things that I've overlooked.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] She really has
a keen sense about her.
SV018.SV018_Area500_Talk_Hint_01_04:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal16"/][UE:Meta key="038f467c6d8c442885ccdc17c6e76320" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yes"/]Consider how heat and water can work
together to create minerals.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] The complex
dynamics of nature are so awe-inspiring.
SV018.SV018_Area500_Talk_Hint_01_05:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal16"/][UE:Meta key="9ba5274bf16d46eeb89e09f5cbe6bd19" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Think"/]I like to arrange my everyday-life tasks
in chronological order.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Normal19"/]Kaia[Npc:EmphasisEnd/] and [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Normal14"/]Sheeba[Npc:EmphasisEnd/]
compliment me on my organizational skills.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="9ba5274bf16d46eeb89e09f5cbe6bd19" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="SadFaceOnly2"/]But...[etc:Wait frame="8"/]I'm terrible when it comes to last-
minute changes.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] I have a hard time dealing
with anything unexpected.
SV018.SV018_Area500_Talk_Hint_01_06:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal16"/][UE:Meta key="ffad54bb2f5240aba5c88b30d2215428" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Think"/]I'm planning an outing so Ms. [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Normal12"/]Mika[Npc:EmphasisEnd/] can try
digging up minerals.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] I think she'll enjoy that
wonderful sense of accomplishment.
SV018.SV018_Area500_Talk_Hint_02_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal16"/][UE:Meta key="e2f63b4a71484e65b8ecc9902cd7eab1" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/][Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Normal19"/]Kaia[Npc:EmphasisEnd/] likes to sit with me and gaze at the
sky while I quietly study rocks.
SV018.SV018_Area500_Talk_Hint_02_02:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal16"/][UE:Meta key="0ce3ad3462ba426fbaebf0610854d188" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yare"/]I've always enjoyed walking in the woods
and finding things,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] but I'm really just an
amateur explorer.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="0ce3ad3462ba426fbaebf0610854d188" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="TalkFaceOnly"/]I hope the professional rescuers are able
to find everyone as soon as possible.
SV018.SV018_Area500_Talk_Hint_02_03:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal16"/][UE:Meta key="5d89dc2fb1b14d1785ef2ea0c4bb02dd" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]This trip's been almost too exciting,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] but I'll
never forget it.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] I'm glad [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Normal14"/]Sheeba[Npc:EmphasisEnd/] invited me.
SV018.SV018_Area500_Talk_Hint_02_04:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal16"/][UE:Meta key="6c9cc3be427641d0b8d9e11ce01faa7b" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]I hoped to collect rare minerals here that
don't exist back home.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="6c9cc3be427641d0b8d9e11ce01faa7b" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02FaceOnly"/]The process of rock formation is different
on each planet,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] so it makes for fascinating
comparative research.
SV018.SV018_Area500_Talk_Hint_02_05:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal16"/][UE:Meta key="8267ba6cb3d14942a45b3fa6c07cb752" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="ClapHands"/]Because of you I was able to reunite with
my friends.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] I see now what a worthwhile
occupation rescuing is.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="8267ba6cb3d14942a45b3fa6c07cb752" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="GladFaceOnly2"/]After witnessing your successful efforts
here,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] I've been considering joining a rescue
team myself.
SV018.SV018_Area500_Talk_Hint_02_06:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal16"/][UE:Meta key="80df5b7d0f7b4f5989c8e3c18aa113a0" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yare"/]I honestly didn't think Ms. [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Normal12"/]Mika[Npc:EmphasisEnd/] was very
capable as a supervisor before this trip.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="80df5b7d0f7b4f5989c8e3c18aa113a0" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="TalkFaceOnly"/]However, after witnessing her bravery and
mental fortitude during the accident...[etc:Wait frame="15"/]
I became aware of my own immaturity.
SV018.SV018_Area500_Talk_Hint_02_07:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal16"/][UE:Meta key="44837a9bc0254035b3df61827b452b93" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Think"/]When you're separated from your traveling
companions,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] rescuers will have an easier
time finding you if you stay in one place.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="44837a9bc0254035b3df61827b452b93" Scale="1"/]I'm glad I knew that cardinal rule for
survival,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] though I had hoped I'd never
have a chance to actually use it.
SV018.SV018_Area500_Talk_Hint_02_08:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal16"/][UE:Meta key="dbdb8fd6d61f451ea7ddb2e373e09929" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/]The Planetary Science Club is very open to
different branches of study.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Normal14"/]Sheeba[Npc:EmphasisEnd/]'s into
astronomy, and [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Normal19"/]Kaia[Npc:EmphasisEnd/] loves meteorology.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="dbdb8fd6d61f451ea7ddb2e373e09929" Scale="1"/]My thing is digging in the dirt and studying
rocks.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] I want to get into more geological
surveying that lets me feel the land.
SV018.SV018_Area500_Talk_Hint_02_09:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal16"/][UE:Meta key="e9970d6a53244d44add3d4655bfef464" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Think"/]Others think my actions are well-thought-
out,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] but I think I'm just slow to act.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="e9970d6a53244d44add3d4655bfef464" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="TalkFaceOnly"/]I'm not like [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Normal14"/]Sheeba[Npc:EmphasisEnd/],[etc:Wait frame="8"/] who has the leadership
skills to proactively jump into action.
SV018.SV018_Area500_Talk_Hint_02_10:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal16"/][UE:Meta key="be0f53c526c341f49644e57d7af19991" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yes"/]I feel as though I'm honing my mind when I
get lost in the process of digging up rocks.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="be0f53c526c341f49644e57d7af19991" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02FaceOnly"/]It's as if nature and I are becoming one.[etc:Wait frame="15"/]
I find it very soothing.
SV018.SV018_Area500_Talk_Hint_02_11:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal16"/][UE:Meta key="ce5e4cd23d7d4299b4debde9fa604809" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yes"/][Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Normal19"/]Kaia[Npc:EmphasisEnd/]'s comments often make me aware of
things that I've overlooked.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] She really has
a keen sense about her.
SV018.SV018_Area500_Talk_Hint_02_12:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal16"/][UE:Meta key="dfc3254fb487411982c0e19c3007a8b9" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yes"/]Consider how heat and water can work
together to create minerals.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] The complex
dynamics of nature are so awe-inspiring.
SV018.SV018_Area500_Talk_Hint_02_13:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal16"/][UE:Meta key="d4207ca037e04d5db6dfff44a18bce0a" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Think"/]I like to arrange my everyday-life tasks
in chronological order.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Normal19"/]Kaia[Npc:EmphasisEnd/] and [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Normal14"/]Sheeba[Npc:EmphasisEnd/]
compliment me on my organizational skills.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="d4207ca037e04d5db6dfff44a18bce0a" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="SadFaceOnly2"/]But...[etc:Wait frame="8"/]I'm terrible when it comes to last-
minute changes.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] I have a hard time dealing
with anything unexpected.
SV018.SV018_Area500_Talk_Hint_02_14:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal16"/][UE:Meta key="fab8260a46d740e5857c0553583bfba7" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Think"/]I'm planning an outing so Ms. [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Normal12"/]Mika[Npc:EmphasisEnd/] can try
digging up minerals.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] I think she'll enjoy that
wonderful sense of accomplishment.
SV018.SV018_Area500_Talk_HappyTalk_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal16"/][UE:Meta key="27c69b46666e4db18f70ec82d49122c6" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]I heard that Rescue Pups are good at
digging holes.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="27c69b46666e4db18f70ec82d49122c6" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="QuestionFaceOnly"/]I would love to come along as your student
sometime,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] if you don't mind?
SV018.SV018_Area500_Talk_HappyTalk_02:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal16"/][UE:Meta key="240e418dcb0740c4a388807e0f9ea740" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yes"/]Can you really sniff out raw materials?[etc:Wait frame="15"/]
I wish I could do that.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] It would make
collecting minerals so much easier.
SV018.SV018_Area500_Talk_Outro_T01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal16"/][UE:Meta key="e769efbd5138498eba681ddaab38d278" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Think"/]They say each of us has about three
others who look exactly like us in this
universe.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="e769efbd5138498eba681ddaab38d278" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="WaitSadNoVoice"/]That doesn't make it feel any less strange
to actually meet one.
